name: Websites
content: A collection of interactive, custom-built websites using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, PHP, Python, Tailwind, and Bootstrap. Each project focuses on clean, maintainable code, responsive layouts, smooth animations with GSAP, and an intuitive user experience.

name: UI Designs
content: A showcase of visually appealing and user-friendly UI designs created with attention to both aesthetics and usability. Every design balances creativity with practical functionality for a seamless user experience.

name: Video Creations
content: A vibrant collection of video edits featuring smooth transitions, engaging effects, and well-timed cuts. From energetic montages to cinematic storytelling, each project brings visuals to life with precision and creativity.
